scripts.build:web:staging: tsc && vite build --mode staging && node scripts/build-ota.js
scripts.build:web:main: tsc && vite build --mode main && node scripts/build-ota.js
scripts.build:ios:dev: tsc && vite build && npx cap sync ios
scripts.build:ios:staging: tsc && vite build --mode staging && npx cap sync ios
scripts.build:ios:main: tsc && vite build --mode main && npx cap sync ios
scripts.build:android:dev: tsc && vite build && npx cap sync android
scripts.build:android:staging: tsc && vite build --mode staging && npx cap sync android
scripts.build:android:main: tsc && vite build --mode main && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build:dev: npm run build:android:dev && cd android && .\gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.android:build:staging: npm run build:android:staging && cd android && .\gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.android:build:main: npm run build:android:main && cd android && .\gradlew.bat assembleRelease
scripts.android:bundle:dev: npm run build:android:dev && cd android && .\gradlew.bat bundleRelease
scripts.android:bundle:staging: npm run build:android:staging && cd android && .\gradlew.bat bundleRelease
scripts.android:bundle:main: npm run build:android:main && cd android && .\gradlew.bat bundleRelease
scripts.android:run: npm run build:android:dev && npx cap run android
scripts.android:run:staging: npm run build:android:staging && npx cap run android
scripts.release:staging: npm run version:increment && npm run android:bundle:staging
scripts.release:main: npm run version:increment && npm run android:bundle:main
scripts.deploy:internal:staging: npm run release:staging && cd android && .\gradlew.bat publishReleaseBundle
scripts.deploy:internal:main: npm run release:main && cd android && .\gradlew.bat publishReleaseBundle
scripts.deploy:draft:staging: npm run release:staging && cd android && .\gradlew.bat uploadReleaseBundle
scripts.deploy:draft:main: npm run release:main && cd android && .\gradlew.bat uploadReleaseBundle
